title: FBI Identifies People of Interest in Bomb Threats Against Black Colleges
sub_head: Juveniles linked to phone number are being investigated for hate crimes
body:
WASHINGTONâ€“The FBI has identified at least six people of interest in a rash of bomb threats directed at places of worship and historically Black colleges and universities, law-enforcement officials said Wednesday. The incidents are being investigated as racially motivated extremism and hate crimes, authorities said.
Dozens of campuses, churches and Jewish institutions have reported receiving bomb threats since Jan. 4, the officials said, though no explosives have been found at any of the locations. More than 20 HBCUs have received threats since Saturday alone.
